text.__SUMMARY__: Conus vezoi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae, the cone snails, cone shells or cones.These snails are predatory and venomous. They are capable of "stinging" humans.
text.Distribution: This marine species of cone snail occurs off Madagascar
